# H&L Cleaning Co.

> H&L Cleaning Co. is a residential home cleaning service based in Central Arkansas. The website allows visitors to build a custom cleaning package with a visual pricing builder, learn about services, and book a consultation.

H&L Cleaning Co. offers weekly and one-time home cleaning with customizable add-ons. The site is a single-page marketing website with an interactive pricing builder where users select a base service by square footage, add rooms, bathrooms, laundry, window cleaning, and specialty services like deep clean rotation, refrigerator, and oven cleaning. Pricing is transparent and updates in real time.

The business is owned and operated by Christina, who provides personalized, thoughtful cleaning with a focus on making homes restful and comfortable.

## Site Pages

- [Home](https://handlcleaningco.com/): Main landing page with pricing builder, services, how it works, and consultation booking
- [Privacy Policy](https://handlcleaningco.com/privacy.html): Privacy policy for the website
- [Terms of Service](https://handlcleaningco.com/terms.html): Terms of service for the website

## Services

- [Pricing Builder](https://handlcleaningco.com/#services): Interactive package builder with base pricing, add-ons, and frequency selection
- [Deep Clean Rotation](https://handlcleaningco.com/#deep-clean): 4-week rotating deep clean add-on covering baseboards, blinds, doors, and handles
- [Book a Consultation](https://handlcleaningco.com/#contact): Contact form to schedule a walkthrough and finalize a cleaning plan

## Key Information

- **Location**: Central Arkansas
- **Contact**: ChristinaFancy6@gmail.com
- **Base Pricing**: $80 (under 2,200 sq ft), $100 (2,200-3,000 sq ft), custom (over 3,000 sq ft)
- **Add-Ons**: Additional rooms ($12), bathrooms ($20), deep clean ($25/wk), laundry wash & dry ($10/load), laundry wash/dry/fold ($15/load), interior windows ($5 each), inside refrigerator ($25), inside oven ($25)
- **Frequency**: Weekly (recurring) or one-time (+$50 fee)
- **Decluttering Fee**: $25 per 15 minutes if needed
